content: Grahame, are there any particular sessions where this will be discussed in Madrid?
@Lloyd McKenzie is there a Sunday Q4 meeting this time?
otherwise, probably discussed Sunday lunch, and then specific topics in specific sessions.
There is no scheduled Sunday Q4 this WGM. We'll probably discuss somewhat in our Mon Q1 session, though we have a number of other issues for that quarter
that would be Monday Q2. But the list is, if anything, a subject for FMG
Yes - the Mon Q2 session will focus on FHIR-I's priorities (Which will be informed by the FMG list)

No, no particular comments, more just wanted to get a better feel for where things are going.
So we're looking at Monday Q2? During the plenary?
Plenary is only supposed to be Q1
Ah, looks like I misread the schedule, or they've corrected it. Plenary now seems to go through Q1 and morning break, but Q2 is unaffected.
The fact everything's an hour later adds a bit of a mind-twist too :)
